attributes.action: Knighthood for christopher dean and damehood for jayne torvill
attributes.additional_details: They should receive a knighthood and damehood for services to ice dance and charity work. They have been overlooked for too many years.
attributes.background: Christopher dean and jayne torvill 's scores for ice dance have never been beaten. Many gold medal winners have been knighted, why not torvill and dean? They were the greatest and have never been beaten.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
